Summary: Something caught my eye over to the right and It was flourescent green falling and it looked like it was falling but then straightened out and started to go down and just dissapered like it should have landed or crashed but it never did.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around February 5th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving with my friend Dylan back to his dad's apartment, and we were catching up and just talking when we stopped at a red light around 7th street and greenway parkway when we both at the sametime saw this light in the sky to the right of us. we were both so awed, at first i thouhgt it might have been a flare but flares dont go that high and fall straight down this didnt. It was a flourescent green light that was almost a sphere but because of all the light and its brief fall iam not sure its exact shape. But it straightened out and then begin to fall again, and we never saw it land or crash or anything and we drove around a little bit to see if we could spot anything else but we never did so we went back home. (When I saw the object I felt amazement and wonder.)
